name: Jumbi Fire Force
description:
When the city is in danger from a biweekly meteor shower, it’s up to the elite and selfless Jumbi Fire Force to save the day! The only problem is that they can’t steer their firetruck themselves. Only you can cart these brave Jumbi close enough to a fire to let them put it out and save the buildings. (Controls are on the game's title screen).

CREDITS

Jarrod "Docninj Roberts, Tyler "Bynine" McMaster: creators

Kevin Macleod: Music

Special thanks to John Marshall
